bibl.title: On "kerukine": P. Heid. IV 334, P. Köln VI 279, and CPR I 232.
bibl.note: Town-criers in Egypt, as attested by the word "kerukine" ("herald's office") and the name "Thoereion exagoreion" ("Thoereum of the Proclaimers, Proclamations?"). - Revised version and translation of C.P.R. I, 232. Slight corrections to the text of P. Heid. IV, 332 and P. Köln VI, 279.
